statements: SELECT * FROM Show_Schedule;
SELECT show_name, schedule_time FROM Show_Schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT show_name, schedule_time FROM Show_Schedule WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT show_name FROM Show_Schedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Show_Schedule ORDER BY show_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Show_Schedule WHERE show_name = 'Game of Thrones';
SELECT show_name, schedule_time FROM Show_Schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Show_Schedule WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT show_name, COUNT(*) as total_shows FROM Show_Schedule GROUP BY show_name HAVING total_shows > 1;
SELECT show_name, schedule_time FROM Show_Schedule ORDER BY show_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShowSchedule WHERE show_type = 'Concert';
SELECT show_name, show_type, schedule_time FROM ShowSchedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_type, schedule_time FROM ShowSchedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, avg(rating) AS average_rating FROM ShowSchedule JOIN ViewerRatings ON ShowSchedule.show_id = ViewerRatings.show_id GROUP BY show_name;
SELECT * FROM ViewerRatings WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShowSchedule WHERE show_type='Comedy' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT show_name, schedule_time FROM ShowSchedule WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND schedule_time <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;

SELECT show_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM ShowSchedule JOIN ViewerRatings ON ShowSchedule.show_id = ViewerRatings.show_id GROUP BY show_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 4.5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;

SELECT show_name, viewer_name, rating, comment FROM ShowSchedule JOIN ViewerRatings ON ShowSchedule.show_id = ViewerRatings.show_id WHERE viewer_name LIKE '%John%' AND rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT show_name, COUNT(*) AS total_ratings FROM ShowSchedule JOIN ViewerRatings ON ShowSchedule.show_id = ViewerRatings.show_id GROUP BY show_name ORDER BY total_ratings DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM shows;
SELECT show_id, show_name FROM shows ORDER BY show_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_genre FROM shows WHERE show_genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT episode_title, air_date FROM episodes WHERE air_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shows.show_name, ratings.rating FROM shows INNER JOIN ratings ON shows.show_id = ratings.episode_id;
SELECT * FROM shows;
SELECT show_name, show_description FROM shows WHERE show_genre = 'Drama';
SELECT * FROM episodes ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, episode_title, air_date FROM shows JOIN episodes ON shows.show_id = episodes.show_id WHERE show_genre = 'Comedy';

SELECT show_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM shows JOIN episodes ON shows.show_id = episodes.show_id JOIN ratings ON episodes.episode_id = ratings.episode_id GROUP BY show_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT * FROM show_schedule WHERE show_name = 'Game of Thrones';
SELECT show_name, show_time FROM show_schedule ORDER BY show_time DESC;
SELECT episode_title, episode_date FROM episode_air_dates WHERE episode_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM viewer_ratings WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM viewer_ratings GROUP BY viewer_id;
SELECT * FROM show_schedule ORDER BY show_name ASC;
SELECT show_name, show_time FROM show_schedule WHERE show_time >= '12:00:00';
SELECT show_id, show_name, show_time FROM show_schedule WHERE show_time <= '15:00:00' AND show_name LIKE '%Game%';
SELECT e.episode_id, e.episode_title, e.episode_date, v.viewer_id, v.rating FROM episode_air_dates e JOIN viewer_ratings v ON e.episode_id = v.episode_id ORDER BY e.episode_date DESC;

SELECT s.show_name, e.episode_title, v.rating FROM show_schedule s JOIN episode_air_dates e ON s.show_id = e.episode_id JOIN viewer_ratings v ON e.episode_id = v.episode_id WHERE v.rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY v.rating DESC, s.show_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shows;
SELECT show_name, rating FROM shows WHERE genre='Comedy';
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_name, age, gender FROM viewers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY airing_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT show_name, airing_date, start_time, duration FROM shows INNER JOIN episodes ON shows.show_id = episodes.show_id ORDER BY airing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM shows WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT show_name, genre, rating FROM shows WHERE genre='Drama';
SELECT viewer_name, age, gender FROM viewers WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY viewer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM episodes WHERE duration > '01:00:00';
SELECT schedule_id, airing_date, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY airing_date ASC, start_time DESC;
